backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Subject, Question, GeneratedPaper with variants) and functions for adding subjects/questions, querying questions by subject/category, and managing paper generation with in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, login page, dashboard, question management, paper generation) to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, including pages (Login, Dashboard, AddQuestion, etc.), components (Layout, StatsCard, etc.), hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component states.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx, titled 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup, authentication-based route protection using Internet Identity, and routes for login, dashboard, question management, and paper generation pages.
frontend/src/components/EditQuestionModa: Dialog modal component for editing questions, currently showing placeholder message that editing functionality will be available in future update.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with fixed navy sidebar containing navigation menu items with icons, active state highlighting, logout button, and main content area with Outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/components/PaperCard.tsx: Card component displaying generated paper summary with subject name, creation date, exam duration, total marks, and view button navigating to paper preview.
frontend/src/components/PaperSection.tsx: Renders a section of an exam paper with a title and numbered questions, displaying MCQ options with letter labels (A, B, C, etc.) when applicable.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a question card with category badge, difficulty level, question text, MCQ options with correct answer indicator, and edit/delete action buttons. Opens EditQuestionModal when edit button is clicked.
frontend/src/components/StatsCard.tsx: A reusable card component that displays a statistic with a title, count number, and icon in a styled layout with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SubjectManager.t: Manages subjects with a form to add new subjects (ID, name, code) and displays a list of existing subjects with edit/delete actions. Uses localStorage and backend actor for persistence.
Displays a visual workflow diagram showing the system's five stages from Subjects to PDF Output, connected with arrow icons in a horizontal layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an ICP actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient. Includes a provider component and hook for accessing authentication state throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing subjects and questions, including CRUD operations that interact with both the ICP backend actor and localStorage. Also tracks generated papers count from localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Poppins and Inter), configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a navy blue and light blue color scheme with dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddQuestion.tsx: Form page for adding new questions to the database with fields for subject, category (MCQ or descriptive), question text, options, correct answer, and difficulty level.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying welcome message with user's principal ID, statistics cards for subjects/questions/papers, and a workflow diagram component.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratedPapers.tsx: Page that displays a grid of previously generated question papers retrieved from localStorage, sorted by creation date with newest first.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaper.tsx: Form page for generating question papers by selecting subject, exam duration, total marks, and question counts per category, then randomly selecting and shuffling questions into 5 variants (A-E) stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with college logo and Internet Identity authentication button that redirects to dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/PaperPreview.tsx: Preview page for generated question papers with tabs for each variant (A-E), organized into sections (MCQ, short answer, long answer), and PDF download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx: React page component that displays and filters questions by subject and category (2/4/6/8 marks, MCQ), with tabs for managing both questions and subjects using QuestionCard and SubjectManager components.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Utility function that generates printable PDF exam papers by opening a new window with formatted HTML content including header, sections, questions, and MCQ options with proper styling for A4 printing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with Poppins/Inter fonts, OKLCH color system including navy/light-blue academic colors, custom shadows, and extended design tokens for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting the Automatic Question Paper Generation System's architecture, features, color scheme (navy/light blue), database structure, and required image assets for the academic web application.
